Package reading_list

Interface ReadingList

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookManagement
public interface ReadingList

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2019 / 2020

The "contract" that identifies which operations has to be available to handle a data structure used to store books

Authors:

  • @author Ricardo Santos
  • @author Bruno Oliveira
  • @author Fábio Silva
  • @author João Ramos
  • @author Óscar Oliveira

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Book book)
    Adds a book to the data structure used to store books.
    boolean changeStatus​(java.lang.String isbn, BookStatus status)
    Changes the book status.
    Book getBook​(java.lang.String isbn)
    Get the book through its ISBN from the books in the reading list.
    int getNumberOfBooks()
    Says how many books exists in the data structure used to store books
    void printAll()
    Prints all books, not null references, stored in the data structure used to store books
    boolean remove​(java.lang.String isbn)
    Removes the book from the data structure used to store books based on a specific isbn.

  • Method Details

    • add

      boolean add​(Book book)
      Adds a book to the data structure used to store books. Only one copy of each book isbn and only books with WANT_TO_READ status are allowed to be added.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be added
      Returns:
      true if the book has been added, otherwise false

    • getBook

      Book getBook​(java.lang.String isbn)
      Get the book through its ISBN from the books in the reading list.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The book ISBN
      Returns:
      book with the given ISBN. Returns null, if not found

    • remove

      boolean remove​(java.lang.String isbn)
      Removes the book from the data structure used to store books based on a specific isbn. Only books with the READ status can be removed.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The isbn used to remove books
      Returns:
      true if the book has been removed, otherwise false

    • changeStatus

      boolean changeStatus​(java.lang.String isbn, BookStatus status)
      Changes the book status. Only one book can have the CURRENTLY_READING status. If the new status is CURRENTLY_READING and another book has this status, no changes are done
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN in the reading list to change status
      status - The new book status
      Returns:
      true if the Book.isbn has been changed, otherwise false

    • getNumberOfBooks

      int getNumberOfBooks()
      Says how many books exists in the data structure used to store books
      Returns:
      The number of books in the data structure used to store books

    • printAll

      void printAll()
      Prints all books, not null references, stored in the data structure used to store books
